name: Button Fury Sumo
description:
In this game even the smallest guy can become the BEST SUMO FIGHTER OF THE WORLD, so pick a control and smash that button, little guy!!!

Controls in Menu and Chacter Selection:

X-Move the selection

Z-Choose

Controls in Fight:

X-Player One Button

Z -Player Two Button

Programmer:

@Bal bo
